comment: He is an okay Professor. This is a senior project class that required group work throughout the semester. This Professor is not professional when it comes to grading individuals in the group. If someone else is teaching the class. Please take them instead.

I did not enjoy this class. Every week we had a simulation group hw due, plus the semester group project. Each lecture went over the week hw simulation, which was so hard to read on the board, I already have contacts, so I know my vision is fine. The 2 exams were difficult and the overall average was low, it pull materials we did not even discuss.

Uses class time to go over questions for labs and expects out of class learning of material through online videos which sometimes are difficult to apply to labs. Term project involves outside travel, and working in groups for the labs and term project is a pain. Is helpful if you ask him at the right time and in the right way.
Straightforward, no book.  I found the quizzes harder than the tests.
Straight forward class.  No textbook needed.

Very easy class with the entire grade on 3 d2l tests. He's helpful and open to go over grades and tests but sometimes it felt like he had an 80% grasp of the material and not the 100% you'd hope for from a professor. The lectures were all teach by doing

He explained the material very well. Most of the coursework was online and you had more than one attempt. This helped greatly in understanding where I went wrong and to learn from the quizzes. This also means I made perfect scores on all the quizzes.  A little grade buffer because the tests are written well. I would take him again.

This class is tandamount to the ME/EE version of Statics and Dynamics. Thus making this class extremely important for IE. Greg teaches the class well, uses Excell alot to allow for practical applications use. (All I ever use in my intership) He uses examples out of the book, but doesn't rely on it like some Professors. Overall, a great professor.

Well I took this class online with Prof. Wiles. He is a great teacher who is very understanding and can teach surprisingly well, in addition he also speaks VERY clear, a break from 90% of the instrs at SPSU. Overall 9.9/10. The class is pretty straightforward, just study, DO HW! He gives you extra points on exams. I would recommend him again.
Study and do the homework and you'll make an "A".  Test can be moderately hard.  This class requires alot of homework.
Excellent teacher.  If you work for it you can get an "A".  Make sure to watch/study online videos in the learning modules.  I would take Professor Wiles again.
Great teacher.  Lots of guest speakers.  I would take Professor Wiles again.  Easy "A" if you follow/study his lectures and powerpoints.
Great professor that really cares about his students.  Do what you are suppose to do and you will get an A.

This professor cares about his students.  I had him for an online class.  I called in each week to listen to him.  His tests were over the material in the assigned chapters and things he talked about.  Most online class I have had did not have teacher interaction...This one did that why I done better in this class.  I learned alot Great class!
Good teacher. Fairly tough tests, but passable.  I made a B. I'd take him again, he's helpful and seems to really have an interest in helping his students learn and apply what they learn.

Great Professor, moderately difficult tests, but he teaches well and if you attend and pay attention and study moderately you should get an A.  Personable and interesting lecturer.  He took a pretty dry subject and made it interesting.  I'll take him for any courses I can.

I took the hybrid class and it was moderate difficulty.  I made A's on all of his exams, but didn't get credit for the last one because I didn't come to the classroom to take it. (All of the exams were online)  Attendance was supposedly "optional but highly encouraged."  He's a good professor, but has very misleading class policies.

He is an okay professor, did the hybrid course. I highly NOT recommending it because it was harder for me to get motivated to come to class because everything is online anyways. But besides that I would give him a 3.75/5
He is the best! IF he offers any class just take him you'll learn alot and his grading is very fair.

If you're step above retard, you get an "A".  I really felt like I was in kindergarten.  He would dumb really simple things down to retard level.  He is very nice and friendly.  I enjoyed not doing anything in the class.

I took Sustainability Engineering with Prof. Wiles and even though the course was mostly an Environmental Science course, Prof. Wiles kept the course interesting.  The tests are open notes and there are a few simple projects to complete with a partner.
Had Prof Wiles for Eng Econ and Intro to Stats. Easy test. Easy Class. Great Prof.
He teaches the material good.explains problems very well. his tests are based on homework and are easy.
